title: register new captain with valid data
description: Test the /api/auth/register endpoint to ensure a new captain can be registered successfully with valid phone number, password, and team details, and that the user and team are created in one transaction.

title: login captain with correct credentials
description: Test the /api/auth/login endpoint to verify that a captain can log in with valid phone number and password, receiving access and refresh tokens, and that progressive throttling is enforced on failed attempts.

title: refresh access token with valid refresh token
description: Test the /api/auth/refresh endpoint to ensure that an expired access token can be refreshed using a valid refresh token, and that token rotation is supported.

title: logout user and revoke refresh tokens
description: Test the /api/auth/logout endpoint to verify that the user's refresh tokens are revoked and cookies are cleared, effectively logging out the user.

title: request password reset token
description: Test the /api/auth/forgot-password endpoint to ensure that a password reset token is generated and sent when a valid phone number is provided.

title: verify password reset token
description: Test the /api/auth/verify-reset endpoint to confirm that the password reset token verification process works correctly.

title: complete password reset with valid token
description: Test the /api/auth/reset-password endpoint to ensure that the password can be reset successfully using a valid reset token and new password.

title: get all teams publicly
description: Test the /api/teams/all endpoint to verify that the list of all teams is accessible publicly without authentication.

title: get authenticated users team
description: Test the /api/teams/my-team endpoint to ensure that an authenticated user can retrieve their own team details, and that unauthorized access is prevented.

title: update team details with authentication
description: Test the /api/teams/update endpoint to verify that an authenticated user can update their team details successfully.
